known_issues: Deployed site URL is incorrectly showing 'mahek' in the URL (unexpected slug/route/base path).

existing_features.title: Add a single source of truth for the intended public URL (the user-facing share URL) and ensure it is used consistently across the app so the user can share a link that does not include the old 'mahek' slug.
Add an in-app, user-visible 'Copy link' control that copies the intended public URL (not `window.location` if it includes an old slug) so the user can reliably share the correct link.

Implement minimal runtime metadata synchronization to ensure the document title, canonical URL, and Open Graph `og:url` match the configured public URL at runtime (to reduce stale/cached metadata issues).

Add a guardrail check to prevent reintroducing the wrong name/slug by ensuring the string `mahek` does not appear anywhere in frontend source files (excluding any developer-provided screenshots or unrelated binary assets).

projectName: Fix shared URL showing old 'mahek' slug by adding canonical share link and removing legacy references
